Articles.Content: I give Humanity their own hills. Our Hillrange.
Humanity has humanitarian hills, but wants this one.

I edit the code:

HillOwners=The\_Minmus\_Derp,HansonKerman,TeslaPenguin1

Peace=possible

MagicPowers=true
Friendship=Magic

I nuke all the cringy ponies. 

my boiled rainbow hill.

> > > On 8/2/2018 at 6:05 PM, HansonKerman said: > > > I use my ReverseTimeWarpContinued to stop you in your tracks. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > DO NOT DISRUPT THE PEACE ON PLANET HIIIILLLL! >

Under the Causal Weapon and Editorial Time Machine Act (4110), you are convicted of massive cognicide of the entire universe which was before you used Reverse Time Warp. The penalty is complete annihilation.

The State's hill, up for auction.
![:funds:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/Funds.png ":funds:")999,900,898,111,122,799,555,000!

[@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)'s hill. which means me and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill.
Yup.

I create a game called Hyper Yup Bros^TM^

my hill, somehow.
I throw apples at you until you leave the hill. My hill.
Apples cost much more than PC. You got bankrupted. Hill is for sale.

I buy the hill for ![:funds:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/Funds.png ":funds:")100

My hill.

So, then you would be just more attentive when reading license agreements.

Everyone has their own small planet with a hill on it. Me, [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill.

A self-gravity sticks together all 8 billion small planets with hills.  

They crash and form a 2000 times bigger planetoid.  
[@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/), [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/) are captured in its center because others were gathering around them.

Only 4 000 000 former hills are on the surface.  

Happily I was one of the last visitors and now escaping with my part of the multihill planet to put it in LEO.
